Title: Nijiiro no Fushigina Ishi
Description: ["An educational film meant to teach children to walk a mile in other people's shoes. Kids who are mean may be having a tough life at home and this is their way of coping. By helping each other out can heal the hearts of everyone."]
Related: ['Prequel: Noobow: Kieta Medal', 'Other: Noobow: Na Kokoro']
